name: Flare Horse
description:
Chose your path precisely between the obstacles while collecting blue crystals to charge your mana. Shoot magical birds out of your way and use your four spells to get as far as possible.

How far can you escape? Compete with other players on a leader board!

Get it on Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.spinningdevs.flarehorse
